attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dartford bridge... even though it has paid for itself over and over again (it was supposed to be free after 2003) Now belongs to the french who intend to increase the price by 50%.
this is a petition against the said 50% increase and to bring it back to UK control...at the very least!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
